issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Posting issue where i see it fits best.

Suggest on creating jira project for appcelerator.com website. 

1. On my.appcelerator.com when signed in:
1.1. Bought a paid module with CreditCard. 
1.2. 'My account'  -> 'Payment History' doesnt show any payments.
1.3. The module is accesible in resources section for download..

2. 'My account' ->  'Manage payment method' doesn't work at all. Renders a big red default error message.

My questions are:
How do i download an invoice that i need for company's accounting?
Where can i find customer support? it seems that the site doesn't have any support at all in regards to website issues etc.

comments.body:
Hi,

JIRA is reserved for filing Titanium SDK, Studio, ACS bugs. You can send your request for invoice/payment related issues to info@appcelerator.com and we will get back to you ASAP. This page is public facing site and I don't recommend using this page for billing related discussion. I will close this ticket after I get you purchase details/email via email.

Thanks
Shak
